The paragraph is describing a medical study where MAP (Mean Arterial Pressure) and HR (Heart Rate) were monitored before and after injections of various doses of AVP (Arginine Vasopressin) and ANP (Atrial Natriuretic Peptide). However, the paragraph does not mention any diseases or conditions. It only mentions the substances being injected for monitoring their effects on MAP and HR.
